member.name: M:ic4.ImageBufferExtensionsOpenCvSharp.IsOpenCvWrapSupported(ic4.ImageBuffer)
member.summary: Checks whether can work on the image buffer's pixel format.
member.returns: true, if the contents of the image buffer can be wrapped in a OpenCvSharp.Mat, otherwise false.

remarks.para:
Wrapping the contents of an image buffer in a OpenCvSharp.Mat is only possible if the pixel format is one of the following:

member.name: M:ic4.ImageBufferExtensionsOpenCvSharp.CreateOpenCvWrap(ic4.ImageBuffer)
member.summary: Wraps the passed image buffer in a OpenCvSharp.Mat.
member.returns: A OpenCvSharp.Mat using the image buffer's memory as pixel storage
member.exception: Data of the image buffer's pixel format cannot be wrapped in a OpenCvSharp.Mat.

member.name: M:ic4.ImageBufferExtensionsOpenCvSharp.CreateOpenCvCopy(ic4.ImageBuffer)
member.summary: Creates a copy of the image buffer and stores it in a OpenCvSharp.Mat.
member.returns: A OpenCvSharp.Mat containing a copy of the image data in the passed image buffer.
member.exception: The pixel format of the image buffer is not supported.
